title: Adobe Target ExperienceEvent Extension

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/target/p.title: Target Unique Page identifier
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/target/p.description: Target generated page identifier for current event.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/target/p.title: Page Score
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/target/p.description: Customer assigned score to visited page.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/target/e.title: Environment Identifier
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/target/e.description: Identifier of the environment on which the event was processed.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/target/a.title: Activities
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/target/a.description: A list of items representing executed activities.
